description:
The rebels are impressed by the combat power of the black fire armor, but the armor is incomplete and still has some problems. When Yin awakes, she has no memory of the fight due to the black fire`s influence. Mo Heng begins making adjustments to the black fire armor in order to finish it.
Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, Commander Meng Ji is demoted due to the destruction of the strike force. He is furious with Empress Cheng and Zhao.
Zhao continues to research the black fire. Ning, who is saddened by his absence, lashes out at his servant Li Xiang. Suddenly, a mysterious enemy appears.
Source: crunchyroll
